snippet: Yakim McDaniels was playing when his clothing became entangled in a parking gate apparatus, and he was crushed at the top of the structure, witnesses said.
abstract: Yakim McDaniels of the Brownsville section of Brooklyn is killed after his clothing becomes entangled in a parking gate apparatus; it is unclear how the 12-year-old boy triggered the gate.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and IVAN PEREIRA

lead_paragraph: Yakim McDaniels was playing when his clothing became entangled in a parking gate apparatus, and he was crushed at the top of the structure, witnesses said.

headline.seo: Boy, 12, Is Killed by Rising Parking Gate in Brooklyn
headline.main: Boy, 12, Killed by Rising Parking Lot Gate in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Boy, 12, Killed by Rising Parking Lot Gate in Brooklyn
